name: submbas
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈(SubMnd ` c1), c0 =(Base ` c2), c0 ⊆(Base ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wi(wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(SubMnd ` c1)→ c0 =(Base ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈(SubMnd ` c1)→ c0 ⊆(Base ` c1))
⊣ (c0 ⊆(Base ` c1)→ c0 =(Base ` c2))

body.origin:

⊣ c2 =(c1[|`s]c0)
